title: Ain't Nothing Like Succubus Lovin'
description: Finding a date was never more hellish. When Jordan Hudson borrowed his friend's "A Dummy's Guide to Demon Summoning" and called up a succubus, he found that making love to a minion of Hell proved to be more than a one night stand.If you enjoy this title, check out "Being Familiar With a Witch," also by Sapphire Phelan.
author: Sapphire Phelan
